column5: looking for a place to buy a flat of crawlers, between wawa and nakina at a reasonable price....... any help???? thanks

Phidelt157: Take a look at http://www.baitnet.com/maps.php?page=ON Then click on List all shops in Ontario. Scroll to bottom of the page and do a search for any city/town along your route to get a listing of bait shops (addresses and contact numbers are provided). Select "match phrase" and "city" as search criteria.
There's a good bait shop in Hornepayne from what I hear.
Try Skinner's in Longlac. Used him about 3 weeks ago--about $60 Cdn/flat. If you need a phone number, let me know. Where are you going in Nakina?
